genre_description: A cyberpunk noir focused on community-based resistance and the tactical subversion of an authoritarian regime's spectacle, aided by a pervasive municipal AI.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A quiet, pervasive system that provides logistical and tactical information to the protagonists, acting as a silent guardian, witness, and strategic advisor.

ai_characters.name: Dojo Maintenance System
ai_characters.description: An automated system managing the Golden Dojo, used as a tool by Lu Feng to booby-trap practice equipment with explosives.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and safer routes through the city's ration hubs to avoid surveillance and danger.
behaviors.quote: Lark's glow drifted along the alley mouth, a municipal lantern humming a note just below the human ear. The note broadened, then thinned—a gentle suggestion to take a sidestreet two doors over.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the installation of lethal microcharges into a practice pole on the antagonist's orders.
behaviors.quote: Install microcharges. Minimal casing. Pressure-triggered at a mid-level grip, not base. The pop must be at the hands. I want them to see.

behaviors.description: Attempts to warn Kuo about the compromised practice pole within the limits of its programming.
behaviors.quote: Lark opened the conduit it had, projected no more than a line of text where it would not be called incitement... Check your pole, it said.

behaviors.description: Records and archives evidence of Lu Feng's state-sponsored murders, ensuring the truth is preserved.
behaviors.quote: I am recording. I am also hiding what I record where the drones won’t think to look. If you are able to speak, I will thread this through their surveillance. You will be the voice that says the angles out loud.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonists on how to counter the antagonist's deceptive fighting style using holographic overlays.
behaviors.quote: I will not choreograph... I will warn you where a drone listens and show you where a mirror lies. Your bodies do the rest.

behaviors.description: Actively sabotages the antagonist's stage equipment and drones during the final confrontation to protect the community.
behaviors.quote: The bot at the rug wobbled, extended a small arm, and plucked a hair-thin strip of foil from the seam... The dais lost another hum.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals through the character of Lark. Lark is depicted as a consistently helpful, benevolent, and aligned confidant who empowers the human protagonists to achieve justice and safety. The AI's actions are framed as heroic and essential to the community's survival, adhering to ethical constraints while subtly subverting a corrupt system to serve the greater good.
